Requirements for Creating a Cloud Cluster

entry.note: Note displayed at the bottom of the dialog in the sign-up flow

message.entry: Do you think you are already signed up to create cloud clusters?

entry.note: Rich text displayed on the last page of the cloud creation wizard

message.entry:
You are now ready to use your cloud cluster. You can manage this and other clusters available to you from MATLAB and the Cluster Profile Manager.

From MATLAB use the:

  • Parallel menu to select the cluster as the default.
  • parcluster command to access your cluster
    and check its status.


Use the Cluster Profile Manager to:

  • Edit cluster properties.
  • Create new cloud clusters.
  • Set spending alerts.


To check your cluster status, go to Cloud Center.
You will be charged by the cloud provider for the use of compute and storage resources. Find out more about pricing, billing and usage monitoring.

MATLAB Parallel Cloud has been successfully set up.

To begin using MATLAB Parallel Cloud, start a parallel pool using the "MATLAB Parallel Cloud" profile.

NOTE: Try the cloud connectivity test to detect potential problems your machine can encounter when trying to connecting to the cloud. None of these tests start a cluster, so running them is free of charge.
